The only good news is that Rubio has been the butt of too many jokes, is too spineless a sycophant to be a leader in his own right. In a free and fair election I doubt he’d even get a nomination, let alone an electoral win. We’ve seen time and time again people try to copy Trump and it really only works for Trump because he’s charismatic and a cynical master manipulator of human nature. Rubio’s just a weasel.
